import React, { useRef } from 'react' import './MovieModal.css' const MovieModal = ({ backdrop_path, title, overview, name, release_date, first_air_date, vote_average, setModalOpen, }) => { const ref = useRef(); return (
setModalOpen(false)} className="modal-close" > X

추천도 80.4%
{release_date ? release_date : first_air_date}

{title ? title : name}

⭐ {vote_average.toFixed(2)}점

{overview ? overview : 'Script None'}

) } export default MovieModal
